author: Michael Wayland
title: Fiat Chrysler's first-quarter sales fall 10.4% as coronavirus pandemic shutters dealerships
description: Auto sales for all companies were expected to be healthy to begin the year, but then fell off a cliff due to COVID-19 in March.
content:
Fiat Chrysler's U.S. vehicle sales in the first quarter declined 10.4% as the coronavirus causes consumers to stay at home and dealerships to shutter.
